dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 3:22:07 p.m.
(GMT-6) on June 23, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet


________________________________

From: Potiris, Georgia [mailto:gpotiris@nutrimetics.com.au] 
Posted At: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 7:42 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notification of Claimed Infringement
Subject: Notification of Claimed Infringement



Please see attached letter 
<<notification of claimed infringement.doc>> 

Georgia Potiris 
Legal Counsel & Company Secretary 
Nutrimetics Australia Pty Ltd 
5 Burwood Highway 
Wantirna Vic  3152 
Ph: + 61 3 9298 7019 
Fax: + 61 3 9801 1072 
Mobile: 0438 174 373 

21 June 2006

Attention: George Poletes
Corporate Counsel
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc

BY email: copyright@the planet.com


Dear Sir

Notification of Claimed Infringement

As its Legal Counsel and Company Secretary, I am authorised to act on behalf of Nutrimetics Australia Pty Ltd, the exclusive licensee of the Nutrimetics trademarks and exclusive owner of copyright material associated with the sale and distribution of the products bearing the Nutrimetics trademarks.

Nutrimetics has acquired over many years a world-wide reputation as a manufacturer and distributor of high-quality cosmetics bearing the  Nutrimetics trademark.   The Nutrimetics trade mark is also the subject of Australian trade mark registrations numbered 216822, 537170, 577652, 577653, 577654, 577655, 584772 and 581625  in classes 3, 5, 25, 29, 30, 32 and 42 respectively in relation to among other things, cosmetics, soaps, toiletries and associated services involving the marketing and distribution of these products.   
Nutrimetics have also acquired extensive common law rights in relation to these trade marks as a result of many years
